Card.Name: stitcher's supplier
Card.RulesText: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

Card.Name: thassa's oracle
Card.RulesText: When Thassa's Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is your devotion to blue. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If X is greater than or equal to the number of cards in your library, you win the game. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

Card.Name: order of midnight
Card.RulesText: Flying Order of Midnight can't block. Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

Card.Name: glowspore shaman
Card.RulesText: When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library.

Card.Name: uro titan of nature's wrath
Card.RulesText: When Uro enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless it escaped. Whenever Uro enters the battlefield or attacks, you gain 3 life and draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Escape—{G}{G}{U}{U}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

Card.Name: mire triton
Card.RulesText: Deathtouch When Mire Triton enters the battlefield, mill two cards and you gain 2 life.

Card.Name: liliana's reaver
Card.RulesText: Deathtouch Whenever Liliana's Reaver deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

Card.Name: diregraf ghoul
Card.RulesText: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: murderous rider
Card.RulesText: Lifelink When Murderous Rider dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library. Destroy target creature or planeswalker. You lose 2 life. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

Card.Name: merfolk secretkeeper
Card.RulesText: Target player mills four cards. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

Card.Name: narcomoeba
Card.RulesText: Flying When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: doom blade
Card.RulesText: Destroy target nonblack creature.

Card.Name: tamiyo collector of tales
Card.RulesText: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents. +1: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. −3: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: tymaret calls the death
Card.RulesText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II — Mill three cards. Then you may exile a creature or enchantment card from your graveyard. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. III — You gain X life and scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control.

Card.Name: the binding of the titans
Card.RulesText: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I — Each player mills three cards. II — Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each creature card exiled this way, you gain 1 life. III — Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: lucky clover
Card.RulesText: Whenever you cast an Adventure instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Card.Name: creeping chill
Card.RulesText: Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life. When Creeping Chill is put into your graveyard from your library, you may exile it. If you do, Creeping Chill deals 3 damage to each opponent and you gain 3 life.

Card.Name: liliana, untouched by death
Card.RulesText: +1: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. −2: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control. −3: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.

Card.Name: breeding pool
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {G} or {U}.) As Breeding Pool enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: temple of malady
Card.RulesText: Temple of Malady enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Malady enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Card.Name: overgrown tomb
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {B} or {G}.) As Overgrown Tomb enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: temple of mystery
Card.RulesText: Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Card.Name: temple of diceit
Card.RulesText: Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped. When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Card.Name: watery grave
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Card.Name: drowned catacombs
Card.RulesText: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Card.Name: hinterland harbor
Card.RulesText: Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Card.Name: woodland cemetery
Card.RulesText: Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.
